019package org.tquadrat.foundation.config;
020
021import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
022
023import java.util.prefs.Preferences;
024
025import org.apiguardian.api.API;
026import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
027
028/**
029 *  When a configuration bean should be connected with
030 *  {@link Preferences Preferences},
031 *  the respective specification interface needs to extend this interface.
032 *
033 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
034 *  @version $Id: PreferencesBean.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $
035 *  @since 0.0.1
036 *
037 *  @UMLGraph.link
038 *
039 *  @deprecated Replaced by
040 *      {@link PreferencesBeanSpec}.
041 */
042@SuppressWarnings( {"InterfaceNeverImplemented", "removal"} )
043@Deprecated( since = "0.1.0", forRemoval = true )
044@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: PreferencesBean.java 884 2021-03-22 18:02:51Z tquadrat $" )
045@API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.1" )
046public interface PreferencesBean extends ConfigBeanBase, PreferencesBeanSpec
047{ /* Is empty since all the stuff has gone to PreferencesBeanSpec */ }
048//  interface PreferencesBean
049
050/*
051 *  End of File
